description:
All teachers need a break every once in a while...and the best substitutes are those who are always prepared. LEARN TO DRAW DAY is an approx 45 minute video program that you can show to your class that will teach and entertain the children with very little input from the teacher.

In this course, the students will learn the FOUR SECRETS OF DRAWING , tips that will help everyone create funny and adorable cartoon characters. They will draw a bunny rabbit, and learn that they can draw just about any cartoon animal just by following adding a few lines to the basic shapes.

The school media specialist will show you how to simply hook your computer up to a TV screen. Then just show the Udemy video to the children and watch them create their own drawings....and the kids will really enjoy the last section as the characters randomly move to their amazement.
title: Learn to Draw Day..for Substitutes and  Overworked Teachers
